title: NY lieutenant governor resigns after arrest in federal probe - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. NY lieutenant governor resigns after arrest in federal probe  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. NY Lt. Gov. Brian Benjamin arrested on bribery charges, resigns  Fox News
  3. The recent scandals that have rocked NY government  Spectrum News
  4. Bye bye, Benjamin: The lieutenant governor has got to go  New York Daily News
  5. Brian Benjamin’s errata: The lieutenant governor can’t seem to get ethics disclosures right  New York Daily News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) — New York Lt. Gov. Brian Benjamin resigned Tuesday in the wake of his arrest in a federal corruption investigation, creating a political crisis for Gov. Kathy Hochul seven months after she selected Benjamin as a partner to make a fresh start in an office already rocked by scandal.
